oya welgamata mada gahana gota umathuwen pelemin, mahindata baha rata hadanna ,mahinda aawoth aayeth horuth ekka ekathu wela parana purudu lesama rata winasha karanawa yana mathaya daramin,mewani adahas thiyena post muhunu pothata damamin ,deshapalagnyayek nowana gota genath mahinda kunubakkiyata dama daradandu palanayakin rata hadanna puluwan kiyala hithana aya karanna hadana moda thakathiru wadeta nam welgama kisida ida denne natha.ee wagema ee pissan therum ganna oona sirisenata baye mulu ganwi sitimin aatha sita mahinda sulanga rali narambauwa shrilanipa manthriwarun wana mahindanadalage baya nathikale welgama peramuna aragena bawa .ese nokala nam ada eekabaddhayakuth natha ehenam pohottuwakuth natha,bihiwanne wimalge wasuge gammanpillege,dinesh ,thissa witharanage hayiyen wame podi sandhanayak pamani.me ayurin gota samaga inne gunamaku awasthawadin pirisak bawa gotabhaya mahaththayawath therum nogena ethumage anugamin welgama wani pohottuwe wirayinta mada gasimata idahara nihandawa sitima pohottuwe awasanawaki.basil rajapaksha mahatha wahama me gana sudusu wada piliwelak kriyathmaka kala yuthuya.
